welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ban Tha Khlong, Thailand! Immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this riverside city, known for its traditional floating markets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ban Tha Khlong has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Don Muang Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, mainly used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, dedicated to low-cost carriers and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'Airport_Free_Wifi' and completing a short registration process.
